type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type. It has to be AgriPhytosanitary.

dateCreated.description: Property. The date and time when the entity was created.

dateModified.description: Property. The date and time when the entity was last modified.

subtype.description: Property. Detailed information about the subtype of the phytosanitary product.

idpdf.description: Property. PDF identifier related to the subtype.

code.description: Property. Code associated with the subtype.

names.description: Property. Alternative names for the subtype.

idate.description: Property. Initial date related to the subtype.

rdate.description: Property. Registration date of the subtype.

edate.description: Property. Expiry date of the subtype.

cdate.description: Property. Creation date of the subtype.

ldate.description: Property. Last modification date of the subtype.

mix.description: Property. Mix ratio for the subtype.

idtf.description: Property. Identifiers for transformation related to the subtype.

comp.description: Property. Composition details of the subtype.

nif.description: Property. NIF associated with the composition.

subs.description: Property. Substance details of the subtype.

prod.description: Property. Production details of the subtype.

ci.description: Property. Additional information related to the subtype.

dose.description: Property. Recommended dose for the phytosanitary product.

measure.description: Property. Unit of measure for the dose.

efficacy.description: Property. Efficacy details of the phytosanitary product.

id.description: Property. Identifier for the efficacy record.

name.description: Property. Name of the efficacy record.

detail.description: Property. Detailed information about the efficacy.

typerisk.description: Property. Type of risk associated with the phytosanitary product.

infection.description: Property. Details about the infection the product is used against.

detail.description: Property. Additional details about the phytosanitary product.

tj.description: Property. Additional codes or identifiers related to the product.

idtpismv.description: Property. Identifiers related to the product's type or classification.

distributed.description: Property. Distribution details for the phytosanitary product.

batch.description: Property. Batch number of the phytosanitary product.

soup.description: Property. Type or category of the phytosanitary product.

dt.description: Property. Date related to the product's distribution or usage.

st.description: Property. Status of the phytosanitary product.

preventive.description: Property. Preventive measures associated with the product.

pp.description: Property. Pre-processing information related to the product.

speed.description: Property. Application speed for the phytosanitary product.

recipe.description: Property. Recipe or formulation details for the product.

surface.description: Property. Surface area for application of the product.

entrylimit.description: Property. Entry limit or threshold for the product's application.

seclimit.description: Property. Secondary limit or threshold for the product's application.

machine.description: Property. Machines or equipment used for applying the product.

idcp.description: Property. Identifiers for compliance or certification purposes.
